Specific Questions About Flooring Solutions?

Our knowledgeable team is ready to answer any questions you may have about all your flooring needs. Whether it be sanding, staining, refinishing, restoration, installation or general advice, we're here to help! Contact us today.

Quality Hardwood Floor & Stair Refinishing

Every project is different. It requires proper planning, budgeting and the right team to execute your vision. Brian Sexton fulfills all hardwood floor and stair refinishing projects, including everything from antique hardwood floor restoration to gym floor refinishing.

your project has potential

After 10 years, most residential hardwood floors begin showing their age; versus 2 - 3 years for commercial wood floors. Worn finishes, scratches, dullness and discoloration are the most common signs that the wood is due for refinishing. The typical 3/4-inch thick hardwood floor can be sanded 4 - 6 times during its lifetime. So unless you live in a particularly old house, chances are that your wood floors can be restored to a beautiful condition.

ABOUT SEXTON HARDWOOD FLOORING, LLC

Brian Sexton offers the highest quality hardwood floor and stair refinishing services in the Greater Chicago Area, Northwest Suburbs & North Shore. Sexton Hardwood Flooring is a dedicated and well-run business with a small team of specialized flooring tradesmen, ready to tackle any flooring project!

  • We do everything in our power to minimize the amount of dust created. Our partially dustless and environmentally safe refinishing process ensures the cleanliness of your home and the health of your family.
  • looring is our passion! We always aim to exceed the needs and expectations of our clients, and there is nothing we can't do to make sure your floor is the luxury floor of your dreams for years to come.
  • With our combined experience and expertise, we'll point you in the right direction for your renovation. Allow our mastery of the flooring trade to provide you with exactly the look and feel you're going for, while providing accuracy and detail.
  • Communicating and staying on budget is a critical part of our approach. We pride ourselves in giving honest and informative quotes to our clients for all their flooring needs.

free estimate

Getting professional quotes should be a priority for everyone. The 80/20 rule applies like most things in life. 80% of flooring refinishers and installers supply inaccurate estimates, while 20% will give real, honest quotes. Don't get stuck with choosing the wrong flooring specialists. Contact us today for a free estimate and compare!

Why Choose Sexton Hardwood Flooring

We let our customers speak for themselves, with valuable feedback and recommendations and a focus on learning on both sides, we always encourage their input, which consistently helps us to improve our service and approach. We would also like to take this opportunity to thank all of our loyal customers for their continued support and confidence in our services.
